ygData.subject: Re: Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Some quests are lots better than others - and there are different kinds of quests - from very simple to more complicated to ones that seem nice but appear to
ygData.messageBody:
Some quests are lots better than others - and there are different kinds of
quests - from very simple to more complicated to ones that seem nice but
appear to be broken. Also, it appears that you cha, class and faction play
a big part of getting the quest as well as the reward (unless reward is
merely randomized.)

Some quests once you know what they are, you can do along the way while you
kill for xp. You just stop by the bards and grab some mail to deliver to
the place you are probably going anyway. Hint: write down the name of who
gets the mail - two hours later and many dead monsters, you prolly forgot
who gets the mail and if you give to the wrong one - oh well no xp for that
quest. Warning: it is dangerous to do quests & trade skills at the same
time. A certain package of mail destined for Freeport got brewed in the
brew barrel <g> (thankful it was not my full backpack!).

And if anyone knows how to do the bandit's tongues quest (named Butcherblock
bandits I think) please let me know.

Sylly
Bard of the 13th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
camped out in Halas


-----Original Message-----
From: Raoul de Grunt [mailto:eq_corbolu@...]
Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 4:39 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Quests

From: Raoul de Grunt <eq_corbolu@...>

Can anyone tell me the use of qeusts? I completed the string
quest at the
qeynos bard guild and only got 2 copper, some faction hits
and a litle bit
of exp for about a 1,5 hour walk. That was when i was a low
level ( at +- 7
), now i am 11 and recently moved to freeport,i love selo's
and the drum, my
shadowknight friend (who's not as evil as you migth think)
was very jealous,
he walked twice as long as i did from qeynos to freeport
:)...

But i'm drifting of, can you tell me what the reward for
most quests is,
because walking for 1,5 hour and getting 2 copper is not
worth it.
And getting exp figthing is much cooler than running.

Corbolu, 11th at Bertoxxulous
